content:
When submitting to the $evaluate operation on our server, we have the possability that there may be more than one guidance response may be returned.
Currently the return paramter has a cardinality of 1..1, but we were wondering if this could be extended to 1..* to allow for use cases where there are multiple guidance responses being returned?
I understand that it is possible to do so in our own IG by creating a new operation definition, but I was wondering if the former alternative was valid?
Feel free to submit a change request ("propose a change" link at the bottom of each page in the spec - requires a sign-up the first time)
